title: Unoccupied Apartments Units for Sale in Gampaha.
details: 2 Bedroomed Apartment Unit on 4th floor available for Sale situated at Kalyani road, Gampaha, within Gampaha city limit. Only 200 m to Colomboroad with modern facilities and common amenities and enjoy life in a pleasant environment. Situated at adjoining the Holy Cross Collage, walking distance to Sri Bodhi Vidyalaya and less than 1 Km to Gampaha Town.
